name: healthcare-wellness-portal
description: Healthcare Wellness & Preventive Care Portal - HCLTech Hackathon

scripts.dev: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run start:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../FrontEnd && npm install

author: HCLTech Hackathon Team
